mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GEO.EMP (EMP_IMG, EMP_NO, EMP_POS, EMP_DEPT, EMP_PW, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_POSTCODE , EMP_ADDRESS1 , EMP_ADDRESS2 , EMP_ADDRESS3, EMP_AUTH, EMP_STATUS, EMP_RETIREDATE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE) VALUES(#{emp_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_no}, #{emp_pos}, #{emp_dept}, #{emp_pw}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_gender}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{emp_email}, #{emp_phone}, #{emp_birth, jdbcType=DATE}, #{emp_postcode}, #{emp_address1}, #{emp_address2}, #{emp_address3}, 'AU003', 'ST001', '', '관리자', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '관리자', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_IMG, EMP_NO , EMP_POS , EMP_DEPT , EMP_NAME , EMP_GENDER , EMP_HIREDATE , EMP_EMAIL , EMP_PHONE , EMP_BIRTH , EMP_POSTCODE , EMP_ADDRESS1 , EMP_ADDRESS2 , EMP_ADDRESS3 FROM EMP e

SELECT e.EMP_IMG, e.EMP_NO, e.EMP_NAME, e.EMP_DEPT, e.EMP_POS, e.EMP_GENDER, e.EMP_BIRTH, e.EMP_PHONE, e.EMP_EMAIL, e.EMP_POSTCODE, e.EMP_ADDRESS1, e.EMP_ADDRESS2, e.EMP_ADDRESS3, e.EMP_HIREDATE FROM EMP e WHERE e.EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE GEO.EMP SET emp_img = #{emp_img}, emp_pos = #{emp_pos}, emp_dept = #{emp_dept}, emp_email = #{emp_email}, emp_phone = #{emp_phone}, emp_postcode = #{emp_postcode}, emp_address1 = #{emp_address1}, emp_address2 = #{emp_address2}, emp_address3 = #{emp_address3} WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
UPDATE GEO.EMP SET emp_pw = '1234', emp_status = 'ST001' WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}

UPDATE GEO.ATT SET ATT_ARRIVE_TIME = SYSDATE, REG_ID = #{emp_no}, REG_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NULL AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

UPDATE GEO.ATT SET ATT_LEFT_TIME = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = #{emp_no}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_CHAR(ATT_ARRIVE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_IMG, EMP_NO , EMP_POS , EMP_DEPT , EMP_NAME , EMP_GENDER , EMP_HIREDATE , EMP_EMAIL , EMP_PHONE , EMP_BIRTH , EMP_POSTCODE, EMP_ADDRESS1 , EMP_ADDRESS2, EMP_ADDRESS3 FROM EMP e WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS late_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS right_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_LEFT_TIME IS NOT NULL AND ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NOT NULL AND ATT_LEFT_TIME < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 18:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS early_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NULL AND ATT_LEFT_TIME IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS empty_count FROM ATT a WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS late_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 09:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS right_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN ATT_LEFT_TIME IS NOT NULL AND ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NOT NULL AND ATT_LEFT_TIME < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 18:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS early_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ATT_ARRIVE_TIME IS NULL AND ATT_LEFT_TIME IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS empty_count FROM ATT a WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND TO_CHAR(ATT_ARRIVE_TIME, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GEO.ATT (EMP_NO, ATT_ARRIVE_TIME, ATT_LEFT_TIME, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE) SELECT e.EMP_NO, null, null, 'batch', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'batch', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') FROM EMP e where e.EMP_STATUS = 'ST001'

INSERT INTO GEO.VA_CHECK (EMP_NO, VA_YEAR, VA_CHECK_NUM, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE) SELECT e.EMP_NO, TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(e.EMP_HIREDATE) THEN 15 ELSE FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, e.EMP_HIREDATE) / 12) + 15 END, '관리자', SYSDATE, '관리자', SYSDATE FROM EMP e
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, VA_YEAR, (VA_CHECK_NUM - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VA v WHERE v.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND v.VA_USE_NUM = 1) - ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VA V WHERE v.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND v.VA_USE_NUM = 0.5) / 2) ) AS VA_CHECK FROM VA_CHECK vc WHERE vc.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(VA_YEAR, 'YYYY')
SELECT EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(VA_USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VA_USE_DATE FROM VA v WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND VA_USE_NUM = 1
SELECT EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(VA_USE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VA_USE_DATE FROM VA v WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND VA_USE_NUM = 0.5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS VA_USE_DAY FROM VA v WHERE VA_USE_NUM = 1 AND TO_CHAR(VA_USE_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND v.EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS VA_USE_HALF FROM VA v WHERE VA_USE_NUM = 0.5 AND TO_CHAR(VA_USE_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND v.EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
